mapper.select: select * from user where role = #{selectedRole} or username = #{searchInput} or nickname = #{searchInput} or uid = #{searchInput} limit #{start}, #{size}
mapper.update: update user set username = #{user.username}, nickname = #{user.nickname}, password = #{user.password}, role = #{user.role}, avatar = #{user.avatar}, user.describe = #{user.describe} where uid = #{user.uid}
